subject: Basketball
Women and Girls
Coaches and Managers
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Becky Hammon’s being named the first full-time female assistant coach in the N.B.A. by the San Antonio Spurs may have started on a shared flight from the London Olympics.
snippet: Becky Hammon’s being named the first full-time female assistant coach in the N.B.A. by the San Antonio Spurs may have started on a shared flight from the London Olympics.
